name: Ninja Wars: Ultimate Clash
description:
Earn money for missions, fight other ninjas and search for pets based on your location in real life to earn money and experience!

Features:
*Multiplayer online Ninja RPG for the iPhone, iPod, and iPad.
*Buy pets based on your location in real life! Visit pets that you don't own to get gold!
*Buy and sell upgrades at the Dojo
*Upgrade your stats after gaining experience points to become a better Ninja!
*Invite your friends via friend codes to grow your crew.
*Gamecenter Leaderboard and Achievements
*Free updates with new features, jobs and weapons.

If you're a fan of Pirates, Mob Wars, Mafia Wars, iMob, Vampires, iVampires, or other online role playing games, check out Ninjas!

Ninjas requires a Facebook account or cell phone number for login. This is used so you can reconnect to your account if you change devices.

Ninjas is an online game only. iPod Touch users need to be connected to WiFi to play. Ninjas is a location-based game, in order to purchase pets in game, your device must be able to use built-in the location sensor.
